success.reason: The assistant located the specified 'City Planning Committee' meeting on 2025-11-12 and successfully updated it to 2025-11-13 at the same time, with attendees unchanged and notifications sent, matching the target slots and user request.

role_confusion.reason: The user only requested help rescheduling a meeting and then provided details about the meeting. They did not ask questions to help the assistant, offer to help the assistant, confirm details for the assistant, or provide recommendations to the assistant.
